name: outlet-ecommerce-platform
description: Root package for Outlet Ecommerce Platform

scripts.install:order: echo "Installing Order Service..." && cd services/order-service && bun install
scripts.install:payment: echo "Installing Payment Service..." && cd services/payment-service && bun install

scripts.install:company: echo "Installing Company Portal..." && cd clients/company-portal && bun install
